title: USB Multiboot MINI XBMC Puppy Hirens 600MB
description:
YUMI-based Multiboot MINI XBMC Puppy Hirens (600MB) Instructions and Documentation

 <a href=" http://www.gooplusplus.com/multiboot-2013-mini-xbmc/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.gooplusplus.com/multiboot-2013-mini-xbmc/</a>

This download uses PendriveLinux YUMI (Windows) to create a basic bootable USB file structure. From the Click-START (or Click-START-WinXP) menu, you will use YUMI only once to format the USB flash drive and install ("Try an Unlisted ISO") a single file empty.iso on the USB drive. After that, you will not need to use YUMI again. The real Linux and Tools distros will be installed on USB from the Click-START menu using a single 880MB self-extracting file.

This torrent will create a Windows directory usb-multiboot-mini-xbmc with all setup files and documentation. There is no need to unzip or unrar anything. There are no keys or passwords. 

This MINI XBMC USB multiboot system is under 600MB installed. However, it requires at least a 2GB USB flash drive since both OpenELEC XBMC and Puppy Linux will create new 512MB SAVE files. You can add more Linux distributions to your USB flash drive by downloading more "addON" distros to your usb-multiboot-mini-office directory and then installing via the Click-START menu.

101 MB - OpenELEC XBMC 3.2 Media Center
036 MB - XBMC addon ZIP files
124 MB - Puppy-Racy 5.5 Linux
106 MB - AVG Rescue CD
001 MB - Free DOS
212 MB - Hiren's Boot CD 15.2 frugal

Optional add-on files:
	
Android, AntiX, Bodhi, CrunchBBQ, Deepin, Elementary, GnuGuitarInix, Knoppix, Manjaro, Peppermint, Slitaz, Ubuntu, XBMCbuntu, Zorin ... and more
